Package RRPSS

Class OrderDB

Object
OrderDB
public class OrderDB extends Object
Order database used to retrieve, update and store entries of orders currently in place. Stores the order records into OrderDB.txt file in the database folder. Confirms the order which will release the table and print out the invoice and add to the sales database.
Since:
2021-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chua Chong Yih

    orderNumber
    The current order number to be assigned to a new order.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderDB()
    Creates a new Order database and creates a new OrderDB.txt file in the database folder to store the sales entry if one does not exist.

      Format of date and time in this database.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderDB

      public OrderDB() throws IOException
      Creates a new Order database and creates a new OrderDB.txt file in the database folder to store the sales entry if one does not exist. Updates the Sales list with the information in the text file. Sets the initial order number to be 10000.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

  • Method Details

    • getFromOrderFile

      public void getFromOrderFile() throws IOException
      Reads the OrderDB.txt file and updates this database with the information in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • updateToOrderFile

      public void updateToOrderFile() throws IOException
      Writes the list of Orders in this database into the OrderDB.txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • searchOrder

      public Order searchOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Searches this database for the order with the corresponding order number.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The order number to be searched.
      Returns:
      the Order if found and null otherwise.

    • createOrder

      public int createOrder​(String staffName, boolean member, int pax, int tableNum)
      Creates a new order with the given parameters and adds into this database.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the staff assigned to this order.
      member - The membership status of the customer of this order.
      pax - The number of customers in this order.
      orderNumber - The order number of this order assigned by the database
      table - The table assigned to this order.
      Returns:
      the order number of the order created.

    • removeOrder

      public void removeOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Removes the order number specified by the parameter. Prints an error message if order cannot be found.

    • viewOrder

      public void viewOrder()
      List the orders in this database with only its order index, date time and order number to be viewed.

    • confirmOrder

      public void confirmOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Confirms the order in this database when the order is completed and to release the table, print the invoice and add the order to the sales database.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The order number of the order that has been confirmed.
